website_summaries.verdict: A solid trimmer if you don't mind the two-stroke engine.
pros: This trimmer is light, comparatively inexpensive, and has enough power to handle most jobs

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Drive shaft MELTED 30 minutes into using it. Seller won't reimburse. Manufacturer doesn't acknowledge. RUN don't walk away from this item.
customer_reviews.author: SuttonsDaze

customer_reviews.title: Pumped the primer the requested 10 times with the choke ...
customer_reviews.text: Pumped the primer the requested 10 times with the choke on it started with 1 pull. Installed a EZ - trim head and the unit works very well.. The engine has sufficient power when trimming heavy weeds or grass.. I own a Homelite trimmer that is 32 years old and has worked very well.. The tiny feul pump is weak and the engine stops when the fuel level is low.. For the price of the NEW Homelite I'll give it a whirl..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF CRAP, WASTE OF MONEY DAMN WEED EATER NEVER WORKED
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE!!!!!!! DO NOT BUY,!!!!! PIECE OF CRAP, WASTE OF MONEY DAMN WEED EATER NEVER WORKED, AND ON TOP OF THAT IF YOU ORDER FROM THIS SELLER, YOU HAVE TO PAID THE SHIPPING FROM YOUR OWN POCKET. IF IT DOESN'T WORK., BUYER BEWARE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: alfred

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we did not use before.return time.ran out. And.then it.did not work. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and Good
customer_reviews.text: Great value and a trimmer I can live with. Also the least expensive. Assembly is a breeze. Motor starts well. I have had a few other brands of this configuration and it is by far the best performer for the money.
customer_reviews.author: William L. King

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy start up. Runs well. Gets a little tied up with really tall grass, but keeps on going. Irritating hand vibration at high RPMs (will remember to wear gloves in the future).
customer_reviews.author: kevartian

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: Cheap!!! Had it three days and kill switch doesn’t work have to choke it to shut it off maybe safety issue vibrates like a hmmmmm!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: A little bulky and sometimes hard to start. Need to include small first time oil and also a strap for 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: bji baker

customer_reviews.title: It cuts very nicely.
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to handle and it has produced us with a great tool to maintain our hill.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Crabb

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished Item Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I received this refurbished item right on time. Easy to assemble and after a couple of uses it appears to work well. A little hesitant about buying used initially but it seems to okay.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Advocate NC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Starts and works good. Bump feed not good. Got a better trimmer head no bump.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Shor

customer_reviews.title: Never even got to use it. Junk
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I started it up the head didn't turn right. Finally at full throttle it would spin but acted like the clutch didn't want to make it spin. After a few minutes it just quit completely. Now it is up to me to box it up and ship it back. I'm liking Amazon less and less. I intend to buy local from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came with a few feet of string that worked pretty well. But the standard string that you buy ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with a few feet of string that worked pretty well. But the standard string that you buy from Walmart et al doesn't work (wraps around shaft and pulls all the way out) and I can't find OEM string replacement on Amazon or anywhere else which means you better have a Homelite Rep next door. I would never buy this again...you get what you pay for !
customer_reviews.author: Marja Yuille

customer_reviews.title: starts easy, has good power for its light weight
customer_reviews.text: this is a handy light weight trimmer. starts easy, has good power for its light weight. easy line advance. I prefer the curve shaft as its easier to trim around poles etc. The refurbished unit served me well 19 yrs ago...figured Id give it another try.
customer_reviews.author: wired

customer_reviews.title: Got this bad boy and have used it about two months now
customer_reviews.text: Got this bad boy and have used it about two months now. Easy start up and does a good job trimming the yard!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: purchased 4/19 motor broke 8/20 (light residential use)
customer_reviews.text: piece of garbage. under 2 year warranty. no help from the seller. DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: It runs great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price. It is a little hard to start but runs great.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: String spool was glued to the shaft of the trimmer. It broke off on the first use, as soon as the shaft got warm. Very hard to start. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Delivered very quickly. Product is fantastic. Price is great. Definitely would buy again from this company
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: runs good.
customer_reviews.text: fired right up. bought a different head for it. runs good.
customer_reviews.author: John Russell

customer_reviews.title: Homelite weedeater
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase, it can on time, In great condition and its easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Emmit Reid

customer_reviews.title: GAS EDGER.......THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: Received promptly, works up to par and arrived in perfect condition. My hubby loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Judee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good strong trimmer, just needs to be a little better on feeding the line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished trimmer
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was a little nervous about buying a refurbished trimmer. Based on other reviews, and the low price, I decided to buy. It works great; just like new. I would recommend this trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Have to manually pull out string. Can't bump it out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Norman Fleagle

customer_reviews.title: low price
customer_reviews.text: unit starts ok . seems not to get full rpm's it works fast enough to do what i need. there were some marks on it and the line head was wore. I didn't care as i don't like the tap n go . they never work. bought a gator 5600 trimmer head that works great with it for $10. so if you want a low priced weedeater and a curve shaft is ok this one was worth the money so far.
customer_reviews.author: hardrich2001

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: originally it ran fine but after about 12 hours of use the lower end locked up ?
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Without a doubt the WORST! String Trimmer EVER Buyer beware The barring seized ...
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the WORST! String Trimmer EVER Buyer beware The barring seized up and the head melted to the shaft first use. The CPO company refused to refund or replace my purchase I can't believe this! You will also spend lots of time changing the string on this one and better heads don't fit.Hope this helps others not to make my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: ... and each time it fires right up and runs great. Even the string which looks like it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this unit several times and each time it fires right up and runs great. Even the string which looks like it is light gauge is very effective in weed eating. I'm very pleased with this weedwacker.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card Recipient

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be the toool I will need
customer_reviews.text: I received it but I have not had the oppurtunity to udse it yet . It appears to be the tol I will need for Spring Clean Up
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Carson

customer_reviews.title: Two solid years of use.  Starts up every single time....no effort.  Powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Husband absolutely loves this trimmer! We have had it now for two years and still love it! It started up the first time he used it and has started up every single time since then. No effort to start this up! To quote my husband "it's the best trimmer we've ever owned"....and we've gone through several of them in our 37 years together.
customer_reviews.author: JPB

product_meta.title: Homelite 26cc Gas Powered 17 in. Curved Shaft Trimmer
product_meta.description: Factory-Reconditioned Homelite ZR33600 26cc Gas Powered 17 in. Curved Shaft Trimmer
